Module org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis
Package org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats

Class PValueCalculation

java.lang.Object
org.monarchinitiative.phenol.analysis.stats.PValueCalculation
Direct Known Subclasses:
ParentChildPValuesCalculation, TermForTermPValueCalculation
public abstract class PValueCalculation extends Object
Abstract base class for methods that calculate a p-values for ontology term overrepresentation.
Author:
Peter Robinson
